bookData.title: Atomic Habits
bookData.author: James Clear
bookData.description: Atomic Habits offers a proven framework for improving every day. James Clear shows how tiny changes add up to remarkable results through habit formation and behavior change.

bookData.title: Rich Dad Poor Dad
bookData.author: Robert T. Kiyosaki
bookData.description: Rich Dad Poor Dad shares the story of Robert’s two fathers—his real father and his best friend's father—and how both men shaped his thoughts about money and investing.

bookData.title: The Alchemist
bookData.author: Paulo Coelho
bookData.description: A magical story about Santiago, an Andalusian shepherd boy who dreams of finding a world treasure. A tale of self-discovery and following one’s destiny.

bookData.title: Wings of Fire
bookData.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam
bookData.description: An autobiography of Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam, recounting his journey from a small town in South India to becoming India's Missile Man and later the President.

bookData.title: The Monk Who Sold His Ferrari
bookData.author: Robin Sharma
bookData.description: A fable about achieving your dreams and reaching your destiny, offering life lessons through a spiritual journey of a successful lawyer who gives it all up.

bookData.title: The White Tiger
bookData.author: Aravind Adiga
bookData.description: A darkly humorous perspective on class struggle in India through the story of Balram Halwai, a poor villager who becomes a successful entrepreneur in modern India.

bookData.title: The God of Small Things
bookData.author: Arundhati Roy
bookData.description: A haunting tale of forbidden love and family secrets set in Kerala, India, capturing the complex social and political structure of the region.

bookData.title: Half Girlfriend
bookData.author: Chetan Bhagat
bookData.description: A story of Madhav, a small-town boy who falls in love with Riya, a rich Delhi girl. Their complicated relationship reveals emotional and societal struggles.

bookData.title: Chanakya's Chant
bookData.author: Ashwin Sanghi
bookData.description: A gripping political thriller drawing parallels between ancient India’s Chanakya and a modern-day strategist who uses cunning to shape the Indian political landscape.

bookData.title: The Immortals of Meluha
bookData.author: Amish Tripathi
bookData.description: The first book in the Shiva Trilogy, this mythological fiction reimagines Lord Shiva as a mortal hero whose karma transforms him into a legend.
